metadata.creator: Nintendo & SEGA
metadata.description:
A collection of all Dream Event songs from the Mario & Sonic games (as of 21-06-2023.)

The Mario & Sonic games featured a lot of remasters and remixes from Mario and Sonic's respective franchises, however, a proper soundtrack without the fluff of the other songs is not readily available, well known, or particularly high quality. So, after 2 days of hard work, here it is!

These songs have been ripped directly from the source files (with some mixing done for some of the more complex tracks), and are available in FLAC and OPUS format.

Do note that there may be some slightly inconsistent volume with these, especially the early games. This was simply a task too great for me without sacrificing quality.

List of games in the soundtrack:
  • Mario & Sonic at the Olympic Games (DS / Wii)
  • Mario & Sonic at the Olympic Winter Games (DS / Wii)
  • Mario & Sonic at the London 2012 Olympic Games
  • Mario & Sonic at the Sochi 2014 Olympic Winter Games
  • Mario & Sonic at the Rio 2016 Olympic Games
  • Mario & Sonic at the Olympic Games Tokyo 2020
